atbat.des: Nate Schierholtz homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field.

atbat.des: Emmanuel Burriss singles on a line drive to center fielder Dexter Fowler.

pitch.cc: Jeremy Guthrie had Emmanuel Burriss down 0-2 but could not put him away.

action.des: With Brandon Belt batting, Emmanuel Burriss steals (1) 2nd base.

atbat.des: Brandon Belt grounds out, first baseman Todd Helton to pitcher Jeremy Guthrie. Emmanuel Burriss to 3rd.
atbat.des_es: Brandon Belt batea rodado de out a lanzador Jeremy Guthrie en jugada de infield fly. Emmanuel Burriss a 3ra.
Angel Pagan recibe base por bolas.

pitch.cc: Jeremy Guthrie showed faith in Ramon Hernandez by throwing that slider in the dirt with a runner on 3rd.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Gregor Blanco replaces Dan Otero.

action.des: Pitching Change: Guillermo Mota replaces Dan Otero, batting 4th, replacing Gregor Blanco.
